name: Adobe Firefly
description: Adobe Firefly is Adobe's family of creative generative AI models, designed specifically for commercial safety and seamless integration into Adobe's Creative Cloud ecosystem.
features: Trained on commercially safe data (Adobe Stock, open license, public domain)
Deep integration with Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, Express)

pricing.free_tier: Small monthly generative credit allocation with free Adobe account.

paid_tiers.name: Creative Cloud Subscriptions
paid_tiers.description: Paid CC plans include a larger monthly credit allowance. Higher tiers offer more credits.

paid_tiers.name: Credit Packs
paid_tiers.description: Additional generative credits can be purchased.

pricing.notes: Credits are consumed for most generative actions. Heavy use may require higher CC tiers or credit packs.

pros: Designed for commercial safety (reduced copyright risk)
Seamless integration into Adobe Creative Cloud workflows
User-friendly interface within familiar Adobe apps
Adobe may offer indemnification for enterprise users
cons: Significant usage requires Creative Cloud subscription
Generative credit system can be limiting/costly
May offer less stylistic range than some competitors
Core model capabilities might lag cutting-edge research

technical_specifications.platforms: Web (firefly.adobe.com), Creative Cloud Desktop Apps, Adobe Stock, API

certifications: Adheres to Adobe's compliance standards (details on Adobe Trust Center)
security_compliance.data_protection: Follows Adobe policies; user content generally not used for retraining without opt-in. Supports Content Authenticity Initiative (C2PA).
